item.description:
The Hartford Black Professionals Meetup Group...is ready for it's official launch of the year. This event will take place at Cloud 9 and will be the first time we are coming together for the year. Members of The Urban Professionals Network and professionals from Hartford County are invited and we are going to have a great time....

You asked for it and now it's back...please come out and support

Please spread the word , there is no admission fee, and cocktail specials.



THE UPN " Meet & Greet " - Hartford
7 Congress St. Hartford,CT 06114

5:30-9:00pm

For any info questions, please contact 203.909.2780
item.name: The Hartford Black Professionals Kickoff 2009 !
